Why would I want english subs for an english show??

@Death2Dipshits. There's plenty of folks out there who understand English pretty well, but struggle with regional accents. They read better than us English speakers so English subs help them out. You don't need them, but someone else might. Imagine a Polish guy watching 'Snatch', or anyone else for that matter. 'English' is a pretty broad description for a language.

@pfa2000. I agree with you 100% not only for dialects, especially when watching some british shows, but also for some parts that are spoken too low to hear or too fast to understand. So thanks @waldorfx! and of course EZ for a great UL

The.Terrible.Puddle you are so wrong.  This show is great.  It's based on a partly mythologized figure, so don't take it as pure historical fact.  The technology, clothing, customs and general portrayal of the people is almost dead on.  This is a great show about the beginning of what we call the Viking Age, during shich Ragnar Lodbrok was an important figure.  It's nice to see a "historical drama" that take the historical part a bit more seriously.  

Show 10/10 (so far)
